definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Of oaths and gibberish frightening girls and boys.
sentences.chinese: 用洋話罵人嚇唬男孩和女娃。

sentences.english: Lv Yao, Bachelor degree, English major , in Modern English for many years .
sentences.chinese: 本科，英語專業，曾在洋話連篇工作多年。

sentences.english: Hello, Could I talk to, please?
sentences.chinese: 你好，洋話連篇。請問有什麼事兒？

sentences.english: Learn the Modern English dealing with the proper code of conduct to follow while engaged in activities for your company.
sentences.chinese: 學會用洋話連篇現代美語恰當處理公司商務活動。

sentences.english: I practice everyday by watching yanghualianpian.
sentences.chinese: 我每天看《洋話連篇》練習英語。
